languages.text: {n}Услышав вскрик Кибеллы, семья Эрэбис вновь собирается вместе. Шесть встревоженных лиц. Шесть человек, стоящих плечом к плечу подобно крепостной стене. А напротив — одинокая мрачная фигура. Тень всматривается в темные глаза... Такие же, как у нее. В бледные губы — такие же, как у нее. Сжимает кулаки и не замечает, как стальные когти пронзают ладони.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Услышав вскрик Кибеллы, семья Эрэбис вновь собирается вместе. Шесть встревоженных лиц. Шесть человек, стоящих плечом к плечу подобно крепостной стене. А напротив — одинокая мрачная фигура. Тень всматривается в темные глаза... Такие же, как у нее. В бледные губы — такие же, как у нее. Сжимает кулаки и не замечает, как стальные когти пронзают ладони.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah's cry brings the Erebis family back together. Six alarmed faces. Six people standing shoulder to shoulder like a fortress wall. And one lone, grim figure opposite them. The shadow peers into their dark eyes... The same as her own. Their pale lips, the same as her own. She clenches her fists, ignoring the steel claws that pierce her palms.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Услышав вскрик Кибеллы, семья Эрэбис вновь собирается вместе. Шесть встревоженных лиц. Шесть человек, стоящих плечом к плечу подобно крепостной стене. Сжимает кулаки и не замечает, как стальные когти пронзают ладони.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah's shriek brings the Erebis family back together. Six alarmed faces. Six people standing shoulder to shoulder like a fortress wall. And opposite them, a lone and gloomy figure. The shadow peers into their dark eyes... The same as her own. Their pale lips: the same as her own. She clenches her fists, ignoring the steel claws that pierce her palms.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le cri de Kibellah pousse la famille Erebis à resserrer les rangs. Six visages alarmés, six individus côte à côte, faisant front commun telle une muraille fortifiée. Et face à eux, une silhouette sinistre, seule contre tous. L'ombre plante son regard dans leurs yeux sombres, identiques aux siens, avant de descendre jusqu'à leurs lèvres exsangues, elles aussi identiques aux siennes. Elle serre les poings, ignorant les griffes d'acier qui s'enfoncent dans ses paumes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's cry brings the Erebis family back together. Six alarmed faces. Six people standing shoulder to shoulder like a fortress wall. And one lone, grim figure opposite them. The shadow peers into their dark eyes... The same as her own. Their pale lips, the same as her own. She clenches her fists, ignoring the steel claws that pierce her palms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cri de Kibellah pousse la famille Erebis à resserrer les rangs. Six visages alarmés, six individus côte à côte, faisant front commun telle une muraille fortifiée. Et face à eux, une silhouette sinistre, seule contre tous. L'ombre plante son regard dans leurs yeux sombres, identiques aux siens, avant de descendre jusqu'à leurs lèvres exsangues, elles aussi identiques aux siennes. Elle serre les poings, ignorant les griffes d'acier qui s'enfoncent dans ses paumes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El grito de Kibellah reúne a toda la familia Erebis. Seis rostros alarmados. Seis personas juntas codo con codo, como si de una fortaleza se tratase. Y una sola figura frente a ellos. La sombra les mira a los ojos... Son iguales a los suyos. Mira sus pálidos labios, iguales a los suyos. Aprieta los puños sin prestar atención a las garras de metal que se le clavan en las palmas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's cry brings the Erebis family back together. Six alarmed faces. Six people standing shoulder to shoulder like a fortress wall. And one lone, grim figure opposite them. The shadow peers into their dark eyes... The same as her own. Their pale lips, the same as her own. She clenches her fists, ignoring the steel claws that pierce her palms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El grito de Kibellah reúne a toda la familia Erebis. Seis rostros alarmados. Seis personas juntas codo con codo, como si de una fortaleza se tratase. Y una sola figura frente a ellos. La sombra les mira a los ojos... Son iguales a los suyos. Mira sus pálidos labios, iguales a los suyos. Aprieta los puños sin prestar atención a las garras de metal que se le clavan en las palmas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}キベラの叫び声でエレビス家が再び集まった。6つの不安そうな顔が並ぶ。6人は要塞の壁のように肩を寄せ合って立っている。そしてその向かい側には気味の悪い人影が1つ。その影が彼らの暗い目を覗き込む…影も同じく暗い目をしている。彼らの唇は青白く、影も同じように唇が青白い。影の彼女は拳を握りしめ、掌に突き刺さる鋼鉄の爪にも動じない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's cry brings the Erebis family back together. Six alarmed faces. Six people standing shoulder to shoulder like a fortress wall. And one lone, grim figure opposite them. The shadow peers into their dark eyes... The same as her own. Their pale lips, the same as her own. She clenches her fists, ignoring the steel claws that pierce her palms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラの叫び声でエレビス家が再び集まった。6つの不安そうな顔が並ぶ。6人は要塞の壁のように肩を寄せ合って立っている。そしてその向かい側には気味の悪い人影が1つ。その影が彼らの暗い目を覗き込む…影も同じく暗い目をしている。彼らの唇は青白く、影も同じように唇が青白い。影の彼女は拳を握りしめ、掌に突き刺さる鋼鉄の爪にも動じない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}听到绮贝菈的尖叫声之后，伊雷比斯家族所有人聚在了一起。六个人满面惊恐，肩并着肩，如同堡垒的城墙一样。站在他们面前的，是个孤独、阴郁的身影，她的影子掠过了他们的黑眼睛……像她一样的黑眼睛，也掠过了他们失去血色的嘴唇，和她的嘴唇同样苍白。她握紧拳头，钢爪刺穿了她的手掌。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's cry brings the Erebis family back together. Six alarmed faces. Six people standing shoulder to shoulder like a fortress wall. And one lone, grim figure opposite them. The shadow peers into their dark eyes... The same as her own. Their pale lips, the same as her own. She clenches her fists, ignoring the steel claws that pierce her palms.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到绮贝菈的尖叫声之后，伊雷比斯家族所有人聚在了一起。六个人满面惊恐，肩并着肩，如同堡垒的城墙一样。站在他们面前的，是个孤独、阴郁的身影，她的影子掠过了他们的黑眼睛……像她一样的黑眼睛，也掠过了他们失去血色的嘴唇，和她的嘴唇同样苍白。她握紧拳头，钢爪刺穿了她的手掌。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellahs Schrei bringt die Familie Erebis wieder zusammen. Sechs entsetzte Gesichter. Sechs Personen, die Schulter an Schulter stehen wie eine Festungsmauer. Und eine einsame, grimmige Gestalt ihnen gegenüber. Die Schattengestalt blickt in ihre dunklen Augen ... Dieselben Augen wie ihre eigenen. Ihre fahlen Lippen, dieselben Augen wie ihre eigenen. Sie ballt die Fäuste und ignoriert dabei die Stahlklauen, die sich in ihre Handflächen bohren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's cry brings the Erebis family back together. Six alarmed faces. Six people standing shoulder to shoulder like a fortress wall. And one lone, grim figure opposite them. The shadow peers into their dark eyes... The same as her own. Their pale lips, the same as her own. She clenches her fists, ignoring the steel claws that pierce her palms.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın feryadı, Erebis ailesini yeniden bir araya getiriyor. Altı tane yüz, endişeyle bakıyor. Altı kişi, kale duvarı misali omuz omuza duruyor. Tam karşılarında ise nemrut bir şahıs yalnız başına dikiliyor. Gölge, kara gözlere dikkatle bakıyor. Kendi gözleriyle aynı gözlere... Solgun dudakları, tıpkı kendi dudaklarını andırıyor. Avcunu deşen çelik pençeleri hiçe sayarak yumruğunu sıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's cry brings the Erebis family back together. Six alarmed faces. Six people standing shoulder to shoulder like a fortress wall. And one lone, grim figure opposite them. The shadow peers into their dark eyes... The same as her own. Their pale lips, the same as her own. She clenches her fists, ignoring the steel claws that pierce her palms.{/n}
